title: Corporate mundo is still disabled??
body:
It's been 2 weeks now, has it still not been fixed or is this something going on with my client? 

I'm not disgruntled or anything, but I'd like to use the only skin i have for one of my favorite champs in league again.

replies.body: It's not your client, the skin is disabled due to a bug that we're currently fixing. He'll be back in business soon.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=6c01TUVX,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-06T23:58:52.555+0000)
>
> It's not your client, the skin is disabled due to a bug that we're currently fixing. He'll be back in business soon.

THAT PUN!!!!
